item.title: Online Resources
item.description: Topics in Statistical Consulting - coauthored and edited with SCCRU at University of Waterloo. A First Course in Statistics - wrote based on my lecture notes for AFM 113, Spring 2022 at University of Waterloo.

item.title: My Recommendations
item.description: Van der Vaart, A. W. (2000). Asymptotic statistics (Vol. 3). Cambridge University Press. Howell, D. C. (2012). Statistical methods for psychology. Cengage Learning. Douglas, C. M. (2012). Design and analysis of experiments. John Wiley & Sons Ltd. McCulloch, C. E., & Searle, S. R. (2004). Generalized, linear, and mixed models. John Wiley & Sons. Seber, G. A., & Wild, C. J. (2003). Nonlinear regression. New Jersey: John Wiley & Sons.
